name: Name
create_type_desc: The form below allows you to create new types of property
edit_type_desc: The form below allows you to update the selected type
delete_type_desc: By continuing, the type will be deleted.
create_status_desc: The form below allows you to create new statuses for the property
edit_status_desc: The form below allows you to update the selected status
delete_status_desc: By continuing, the status will be deleted.
title: Title
create_property_desc: The form below allows you to create new properties
delete_property_desc: By continuing, the property will be deleted.
images_desc: The form below allows you to update the selected property images
edit_property_desc: The form below allows you to update the selected property
basic_information_desc: The form below allows you to update the selected property basic information
preview_desc: The form below allows you to update the selected property preview
active_desc: By continuing, the property will be activated.
featured_desc: By continuing, the property will be featured.
pricing_type_desc: The form below allows you to update the selected property pricing type
for_sale_desc: If open shows that the property is for sale
for_rent_desc: If open shows that the property is for rent
pricing_desc: The form below allows you to update the selected property pricing
interior_desc: The form below allows you to update the selected property interior
elevator_desc: If open shows that the property has an elevator
attributes_desc: The form below allows you to update the selected property attributes
location_desc: The form below allows you to update the selected property location
map_desc: The form below allows you to update the selected property map
agent_desc: The form below allows you to update the selected property agent
